scripts.test: cd ./packages/stylelint4b && npm run test && cd ../vue-stylelint-editor && npm run test && cd ../../
scripts.test:chrome: cd ./packages/stylelint4b && npm run test:chrome && cd ../vue-stylelint-editor && npm run test:chrome && cd ../../
scripts.build: cd ./packages/stylelint4b && npm run build && cd ../vue-stylelint-editor && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.build:dev: cd ./packages/stylelint4b && npm run build:dev && cd ../vue-stylelint-editor && npm run build:dev && cd ../../
scripts.postinstall: cd ./packages/stylelint4b && npm i --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../vue-stylelint-editor && npm i --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../../
scripts.docs-deploysetup: npm run docs:update && npm run docs:build && npm run docs-deploysetup:clean && npm run docs-deploysetup:copy
scripts.upgrade: npm i -D stylelint@latest postcss-styl@latest stylelint-config-standard@latest stylelint-order@latest stylelint-stylus@latest stylelint-scss@latest
